# Government Tender Announcement: Stage 1 - Cape Breton Highlands National Park - Keltic Road Infrastructure Upgrades (East)

### Project Overview

Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to upgrade the road and underground infrastructure at the Keltic Lodge Area of Cape Breton Highland National Park. The project consists of Phase 1 upgrades to the roads and underground infrastructure on the eastern portion of the Keltic Lodge facilities, including the renewal of the water distribution system, sanitary sewer collection system, storm sewer system, asphalt roads, parking lots, and driveways.

### Project Requirements

The successful bidder will be responsible for supplying all necessary materials, labor, equipment, and ancillaries to complete the project. The project components include:

* Supply and installation of environmental protection measures for site erosion and sediment control
* Supply and operation of traffic control and signage
* Rehabilitation of roadways within the eastern portion of Keltic Lodge area
* Replacement of watermain under eastern portion of Keltic Lodge area
* Replacement of sanitary pipe network on the eastern portion of Keltic Lodge area
* Construction of a new storm sewer network at the Keltic Lodge facility area
* Mechanical and electrical upgrades to the Keltic Lodge lift station
* Reinstatement of all areas at the end of construction
* Restoration of all affected off-road areas
* Maintenance of roadways clean and control dust throughout the project duration

### Submission Requirements

Bidders are required to submit their proposals in two stages. The first stage will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers, and the second stage will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

### Tender Information

* **Project Number:** 5P468-23-0046
* **Closing Date:** May 25, 2023, at 1:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Bid Submission:** Bids can be submitted by email or fax to the contact information below:
	+ Email: sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca
	+ Fax: 1-855-983-1808

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Sheldon Lalonde
* **Contact Information:** sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (343) 585-3836

### Additional Information

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Late submissions will not be considered.
